name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ying32178493 In the past two years, the property management has been forcing various fees on the owners, which has caused them to suddenly think that they can change the property management. Therefore, it has been common for the old property management to not allow the new property management to move in, which has often led to conflicts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking News
Just now, Xinhua News Agency reported that the CPC Central Committee decided to appoint Comrade Wu Qing as the Party Secretary of the China Securities Regulatory Commission and to remove Comrade Yi Huiman from the position of Party Secretary of the China Securities Regulatory Commission. The State Council decided to appoint Comrade Wu Qing as the Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission and to remove Comrade Yi Huiman from the position of Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 7, at the Aidenqiao intersection in Lucheng District, Wenzhou City, a roadside tree suddenly broke and hit a woman who was driving an electric vehicle. Her life or death is unknown.
Some netizens said that they had reported the safety hazards of the trees on this road section five years ago, but were evaded by the local authorities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
When Shenzhen Costco opened, the "output tax", "price excluding tax" and "output tax amount" were printed on the receipt separately to tell taxpayers how much they paid for their purchase.
However, three weeks after the opening, the output tax amount is no longer shown separately on the receipt, only the total is shown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Wu Qing served as the Party Secretary and Chairman of the Shanghai Stock Exchange in 2016.
In July 2023, he served as the Deputy Secretary of the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee and concurrently the Secretary of the Shanghai Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 7, employees of the Guangzhou Institute of Biomedicine and Health received a mass email denouncing the party secretary (legal representative) and vice president Duan Ziyuan for "being greedy", abusing his power for personal gain, seizing employee resources and benefits, and suppressing middle-level cadres.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the topic "I finally understand those who don't want to go home for the New Year" has become a hot search, and netizens have posted to participate in the discussion. They said that they don't want to go home for the New Year, mainly due to poor relationships with relatives and friends, short annual leave, long journeys, high expenses, urging marriage, urging children, all of which have become their reasons for not wanting to go home.
Netizens replied, "The third sentence is inseparable from money, the fourth sentence is about marriage, the fifth sentence is about saving, the sixth sentence is about being sensible, the seventh sentence is about it's not easy to raise you, the eighth sentence is about you looking at other people's homes, and the ninth sentence is about you to strive for success." Some netizens posted pictures in the comment area to show that they will not go home for the New Year and stay in the rental house. One netizen replied, "The rental house has all my things, it is my safe haven, but there is none at home"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The blogger tells why he doesn't want to go home for the New Year

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 7, Henan. The water and electricity in Shui'an Xingcheng Community were not connected to the grid and the property management fees were high. This caused dissatisfaction among the owners, who gathered at the developer's building to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 7, Changsha, Hunan. Migrant workers jumped off a building to demand their wages. Firefighters laid air cushions downstairs, and then the migrant workers were taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 6, Meishan, Sichuan. Xuhui Yunyue Tianjing Community owed wages to migrant workers, and the workers hung banners outside the community gate to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 7, an employee of Shanghai Bank revealed online that their year-end bonus last year was 7,000 yuan, but this year not only was there no year-end bonus, but even their holiday allowances and wages had to be deducted and deferred.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 7, ByteDance employees collectively complained on Weibo that ByteDance’s Spring Festival red envelopes in 2024 would be 50% off.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 6, in Qinhuangdao, Hebei, migrant workers who had been owed wages for three years had failed to get their wages, so they brought pesticides and quilts to the Qinglong Manchu Autonomous County Labor Bureau to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This year's New Year's atmosphere is a little weird:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of February 7, Messi played in Japan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 6, at Minghao Yangxi in Yingkou, Liaoning, migrant workers held banners to demand their wages and called out to the city government leaders: Can you have pity on us migrant workers and pay our wages? Our wives and children are waiting for our wages for the New Year!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 6, Tianjin. Migrant workers who were owed wages came to the Jinghai District Government Building to demand their wages.
A row of security guards had already stood outside the government building, waiting to prevent the migrant workers from approaching.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today's news summary
February 7th, the Spring Festival is approaching, and people all over the country are asking for wages. It is the 4th anniversary of Li Wenliang's death. Messi plays in Japan. Huo Qigang issued a long article to condemn [Xuehua Daily News]
